Container.Name: tinyMediaManager
Container.Overview: Tiny Media Manager is a media management tool written in Java/Swing. It is written to provide metadata for the Kodi Media Center (formerly known as XBMC), MediaPortal and Plex media server. [br][br] The GUI of the application is accessed through a web browser. Based on Alpine Linux so the container size is very small (less than 100MB in download size). [br][br][span][/span]
